casebody.data:
Stacey Mccoy BROOKS
v.
Erik A. HOOKS, Secretary of NCDPS; Katy Poole, Superintendent of Scotland Correctional Institution No. 156P10-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 16, 2017 Stacey McCoy Brooks, for Brooks, Stacey McCoy. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 14th of June 2017 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Hertford County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of June 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
